dividend_growth.rationale: Compounding income stream for retirement needs while participating in equity growth.

global_total_market.rationale: Maximum diversification for multi-generational wealth preservation and growth.

investment_grade_corporates.rationale: Steady income generation to support retirement withdrawals.

long_term_treasuries.rationale: Hedge against deflationary busts and equity drawdowns.

real_estate.rationale: Inflation-protected income stream with capital appreciation potential.

architect_notes: Designed for dual mandate: immediate retirement income needs and dynastic (100-year) capital growth. Heavy emphasis on dividend growth equities allows for rising income streams to combat centennial inflation.
